label: Carbon Certification Type
name: Supplier-custom_carbon_certification_type
options:
ISO 14064
Carbon Trust
SBTi
Nature Based Solutions
Other

description: Carbon impact of this stock movement
label: Total Carbon Impact (kg CO2e)
name: Stock Entry-custom_total_carbon_impact_kg_co2e

label: Carbon Intensity Rating
name: Supplier-custom_carbon_intensity_rating
options:
A - Excellent
B - Good
C - Average
D - Poor
E - Very Poor

description: Total carbon footprint of this sale
label: Total Carbon Emissions (kg CO2e)
name: Sales Invoice-custom_total_carbon_emissions_kg_co2e

description: Carbon emission factor per unit (kg CO2 equivalent)
label: Carbon Emission Factor (kg CO2e per unit)
name: Item-custom_carbon_emission_factor_kg_co2e_per_unit

label: Emission Source
name: Item-custom_emission_source
options:
Direct Manufacturing
Transportation
Electricity
Raw Material
Packaging
Other

label: Carbon Scope
name: Item-custom_carbon_scope
options:
Scope 1 - Direct
Scope 2 - Indirect Energy
Scope 3 - Other Indirect

label: Calculation Method
name: Item-custom_calculation_method
options:
Per Unit
Per Weight
Per Volume
Fixed Amount
